Model based. From Section 1, treating G as the union of G [v] 's describes a generation process 
on G. EXTRACT then describes the reverse of such a process. This links to the graph generation 
literature [26]. e.g., forest-fire generation model would correspond to EXTRACT being forest-fire 
sampler [25]
